alert.note: Alert for Greene; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 1:20AM CDT until July 13 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR WEBSTER...SOUTHERN WRIGHT AND GREENE COUNTIES... At 120 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartville to Diggins to near Rogersville to near Ash Grove, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Republic, Marshfield, Battlefield, Willard, Mountain Grove, Rogersville, Strafford, Seymour, Ash Grove, Mansfield, Fordland, Norwood, Hartville, Duncan, Brookline, Diggins, Glidewell, Turners and Bois D`arc. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 62 and 100. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
